Text: I downloaded this from the BBC iplayer site & used the "getiplayer" software, so it would not "time expire" as a normal iplayer DL will always do,watched it & as others have said,great movie,had me in tears,great acting from all,great production from the BBC,I thank you very much for this DL,in *.avi,this allows me to put it on my USB Hard drive & show it at 720p/1020p on my HDMI TV to the rest of my family,THANK YOU
